column1:
/* Flexible iFrame */
     
    .flexible-container {
        position: relative;
        padding-bottom: 56.25%;
        padding-top: 30px;
        height: 0;
        overflow: hidden;
    }
     
    .flexible-container iframe,   
    .flexible-container object,  
    .flexible-container embed {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
    }
